Package io.netty5.channel.local

Class LocalChannel

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Channel, ChannelOutboundInvoker, IoHandle, AttributeMap, FuturePromiseFactory, Comparable<Channel>
    public class LocalChannel
extends AbstractChannel<LocalServerChannel,​LocalAddress,​LocalAddress>
    A Channel for the local transport.

                     throws Exception
        Description copied from class: AbstractChannel
        Connect to remote peer.
        Specified by:
        doConnect in class AbstractChannel<LocalServerChannel,​LocalAddress,​LocalAddress>
        Parameters:
        remoteAddress - the address of the remote peer.
        localAddress - the local address of this channel.
        Returns:
